Description:
Take sales calls and generate leads
Develop and execute sales pitches
Close deals and meet sales targets
Provide excellent customer service
Maintain reports of potential prospects for the management
Brainstorm new product or service launches with team members
Understand and promote the company's products and services
Bring sales through own channels and earn commissionSkills
Skills:
In-depth knowledge to convert leads into a final customer, thereby contributing to the company revenue.
Proven track record of maintaining professional ethics through the portrayal of exemplary soft skills.
Ability to implement the 'customer first' approach by providing a personalized and convenient sales pitch.
Tremendous enthusiasm to efficiently achieve sales goals under tight deadlines.
Excellent phone and presentation skills.
Depicting remarkable command to convert leads into customers through passionate discussions and debates.
